timeline.message:
chore: (2.34) Refactor overall synchronization implementation

- Clean code
- Make code simpler and more consistent
- Introduce JobParameters for DataSynchronizationJob

DHIS2-6062

timeline.bodyText: This class is fairly complex and, as far as I can see, there is no test coverage.
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: This private initialization may be hard to unit test, especially because static calls are used (SyncUtils.getLastSyncSuccess(..))
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: No test coverage for this class, as far as I can see
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: System.out to be removed or changed to Log
timeline.author: enricocolasante

timeline.bodyText:
Is this abstract class still needed at all?
It seems to me that having an abstract class just with fields reduce a lot the readability of the code.
timeline.author: enricocolasante
